head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FABRICANT, BENJAMIN, MD.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FABRICANT, BENJAMIN, MD.

block.p: FABRICANT-Benjamin, MD. Devoted husband of the late Ida and Dorothy. Devoted father of Susan and Sam Hess, Carole and Allan Kasmin, Stephen and Barbara Benjamin, Laura Benjamin and Barbara Schwartz. Dear brother of Betty Lieberman and the late Lou and Charlie. Adored grandfather and great-grandfather. Services Thursday, 11 A.M., at Schwartz Bros, Jeffer Memorial Chapel, Queens Boulevard and 76th Road, Forest Hills.

FABRICANT-Benjamin, MD. Devoted husband of the late Ida and Dorothy. Devoted father of Susan and Sam Hess, Carole and Allan Kasmin, Stephen and Barbara Benjamin, Laura Benjamin and Barbara Schwartz. Dear brother of Betty Lieberman and the late Lou and Charlie. Adored grandfather and great-grandfather. Services Thursday, 11 A.M., at Schwartz Bros, Jeffer Memorial Chapel, Queens Boulevard and 76th Road, Forest Hills.
